package.name: linux-nopae
package.unpack: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}.tar.xz | tar xf -
package.patch:
localversion='ll-nopae-0'
major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` cd linux-${major}.${minor} [ -f ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz ] && unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz | patch -p1 cp -v ${SRCDIR}/lesslinux-fblogo-20100922.ppm drivers/video/logo/logo_linux_clut224.ppm cp -v ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}-config-nopae .config sed -i 's/CONFIG_LOCALVERSION=""/CONFIG_LOCALVERSION="-'$localversion'"/g' .config cd .. mv linux-${major}.${minor} linux-${PKGVERSION}
package.build: cd linux-${PKGVERSION} yes '' | make oldconfig make clean if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` pump make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" pump make -j $jobcount bzImage CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else make -j 4 make -j 4 bzImage fi rsync -avHP /usr/local/VirtualBox/src/ ../VirtualBox/ for mod in vboxdrv vboxnetadp vboxnetflt vboxpci ; do make -C . M=../VirtualBox/${mod} modules done
package.install:
localversion='ll-nopae-0'
cd linux-${PKGVERSION} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/boot mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/src/linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ln -sf linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ${TGTDIR}/usr/src/linux-lesslinux-nopae INSTALL_MOD_PATH=${TGTDIR} make modules_install for mod in vboxdrv vboxnetadp vboxnetflt vboxpci ; do INSTALL_MOD_PATH=${TGTDIR} make -C . M=../VirtualBox/${mod} modules_install done rm -rf ${TGTDIR}/lib/firmware install -m 0644 arch/x86/boot/bzImage ${TGTDIR}/boot/vmlinuz-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ln -sf ${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/lesslinux-nopae for link in source build ; do rm ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/${PKGVERSION}-${localversion}/$link ln -sf /usr/src/linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/${PKGVERSION}-${localversion}/${link} done find ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} -type f -name '*.ko' -exec strip --strip-unneeded {} \; make clean make modules_prepare tar -cvJf ${TGTDIR}/usr/src/linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion}/linux.tar.xz .
